[h1]Хороший обзор на не плохую игру![/h1]

Very nice game,altho you should still work on the anti-cheat system.

Absolutely the worst game on the market right now, free or not, there is certainly no point in even beginning to download this game. I see no reason why someone would think this game is even somewhat enjoyable, and it is certainly a waste of space on my computer. Will be uninstalling right now.
Its tough at first, and real fustrating. But just keep playing and you will get the hang of it!

Оч крутая игра. Советую скачать. Если хотите купить прайм-статус, то советую сначала потренироваться без прайма. В мастерской много карт для тренировки аима и другого.

Too much cheating if you haven't played for years and years not the best shooter to get into. If they are cheating then they are better than you and will stay that way. Go play valorant or something better till steam gets their brain ball out of their fart slide.
